Ismaël Eragae Alassane (amụrụ ya n'ụbọchị nke 3 n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1984) bụ onye Nijeria na-agba bọọlụ. Ọ na-egwuri egwu dị ka onye na-agba n'etiti.
Ọ gbara bọọlụ dika onye azụ JS du Ténéré, Sahel SC ASFA Yennega na Enyimba International F.C.
Mgbe ọ na-agbara otu egwuregwu ASFA Yennega, Alassane nyere penalty ka klọb ahụ meriri na 2007 CAF Champions League preliminary round.
Ọ bụ onye otu egwuregwu bọọlụ mba Niger.
